page.title: 04BENNIWORTH VILLAGE
page.content: Benniworth is not a very big village, and has not many commercial or public properties,in fact there are only thirteen commercial properties most of which do not sell direct.There are five public and community services,a church down Church Lane,down Main Road there is a Post Box and a Telephone Box.Along North Street there is a Wall Post Box. Another main feature is the Council Building Plot which seperates Meadow Lane and Tennyson Close,this is used as a playing field as the Council have not done anything with it.There is also some building taking place down Meadow Lane which will bring the total resedences down that road to nine. Benniworth Church is thought to be Norman though we can not be sure.
